Name: mal-cheriyamundamab-la
Author: Cheriyamundam Abdul Hameed And Kunhi Mohammed Parappoor

Translations.Text: valiye ninakk ninre raksitav (anugrahannal) nalkunnatum appeal ni trptippetunnatumana.‌
ninne avan oru anathayayi kanetattukayum , ennitt (ninakk‌) asrayam nalkukayum ceytille
ninne avan vali ariyattavanayi kanetattukayum ennitt (ninakk‌) margadarsanam nalkukayum ceytirikkunnu
ninne avan daridranayi kanetattukayum ennitt avan aisvaryam nalkukayum ceytirikkunnu
ceadicc varunnavane ni viratti vitukayum ceyyarut‌
ninre raksitavinre anugrahatte sambandhicc ni sansarikkuka
